text: Calvin Peete (July 18, 1943 â€“ April 29, 2015) was an American professional golfer. He was the most successful African-American on the PGA Tour, with 12 wins, before Tiger Woods. Peete was born in Detroit, Michigan. Peete died of lung cancer, in Atlanta, Georgia on April 29, 2015, aged 71. ==References== ==Other websites== * * *Calvin Peete Golf Companies Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from lung cancer Category:American golfers Category:Sportspeople from Detroit
title: Calvin Peete
